note:
Space nerd, culinary geek. Follow me for puns, stay for my demon expertise.

I have a soft spot for fashion, quasars, and space ships. Like to get lost in the Orion Nebula on clear winter nights.

#RefuseDystopia

No subtext. If in doubt, ask.

Profile Pic: The star RS Puppis with long diffraction spikes, surrounded by whirling nebulousity.

The banner image is an part of the eagle nebula, showing a bottom bit if the Pillars of Creation.

name: Occupation

name: Free time
value: Beginner hobby astronomer and dipping my toes in astrophotography
